metadata.title: CVE-2024-46304 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A NULL pointer dereference in libcoap v4.3.5-rc2 and below allows a remoteattacker to cause a denial of service via the coap_handle_request_put_blockfunction in src/coap_block.c.

criterions.comment: libcoap package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
